name: Carpool Driver
description:
Have you ever wondered how it feels to be a successful ride share driver?
In our game you can :
* buy and customize unique and amazing cars
* meet and chat with your clients
* explore amazing cities
* compete with other drivers to be the first on the leader board.


How to play :
Tap on screen to start.
hold on screen to accelerate (and move forward)
release to brake
avoid obstacles and take your clients to their destination as fast as possible.
